reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and true to size, with one mentioning it's perfect for sleeping in. Customers describe the dress as flattering, with one noting it works well for larger arms, and they appreciate its well-made construction.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality!
items.body: I purchased a large and I weigh 199 and am 5’7”. I could have gotten away with a medium. But it didn’t look too big, it fit great. I was able to take it immediately from its packaging and place it in the dryer on the dewrinkle setting. It came out nicely without having to iron it. The quality of the dress is nice, it’s layered with a slip underneath it to keep from showing through. With my height, it comes almost down to my ankles, just above them. I love the flow of the dress and the color, and it’s comfortable. Read more
items.author: Jasmine D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and very flattering as well. Fabric is very crisp. Great for our southern warm weather. I’m a XXL girl with large arms and the sleeves weren’t snug at all. Very flattering for larger arms. Would definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Lrose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: So flattering! Great length. Good value for the money. Dress it up with nice shoes and jewelry or dress it down with sneakers. Read more
items.author: Shelby

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: This is a attractive dress well made and nice material. Too hot for summer but perfect for fall and winter. I wish it had pockets. Read more
items.author: R. Thomas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs large.
items.body: Beautiful dress. Runs large. I return it and will order again next size down. Read more
items.author: Janice H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection!
items.body: I am overjoyed with this purchase. Zesica is quickly becoming a favorite brand. This dress is so comfortable that I could easily sleep in it, yet it is dressy enough for church, a wedding, or a nice dinner. It fits perfectly, which is generally difficult for me to find. I love the modesty and the crew neckline is perfect!! 10/10!! Read more
items.author: Summer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: Nice dress. Nice soft color. Lined. Heavy. Sized right Read more
items.author: Patti Pitzer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & beautiful
items.body: I wore this to my niece's wedding yesterday. Read the reviews about comfort & compliments, they are so true. This is not my usual style attire, but I will tell you I LOVE this dress! Love the pockets. I received so many compliments. It was so comfortable. Dressed it up with jewelry and wore with ankle boots. One word of advice on sizing, if you have broad shoulders or are a c cup or higher, I would recommend sizing up one size. I did and don't regret it. Purchased the mustard color, prefect for fall. Read more
items.author: Tooz60

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Brown, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Brick Red, Light Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Pink, Beige, Purple, Mustard. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
